data.name: Find Me In The Maze
data.detailed_description:
Find Me In The Maze is a heart touching 3D platformer featuring a dead warrior revived again to restart his journey.
Unique and challenging levels
In Find Me In The Maze you will get across an abundance of unexpected obstacles , angry dragons , giant birds , forest fey , and pirate clothed skeletons.
The game is developed my a one person studio. He is about to take you on a wonderous journey where one thing is for sure: Find the hidden story behind this maze.
A hidden tale to be discovered
Discover a touching and heartfelt story told by the characters along the way. Try to match all the puzzles of the tale and find your own full version of the story.
Changing hero every level
The hero you are playing with can change from an assassin to a devil to a pirate skeleton depending on the level environment.

data.short_description: Revived by a witch, a warrior relive his journey trying to pass the maze and see what happened to him and his friends in the past.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: intel Core i5 3570k or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 980 or AMD R7 290x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
